title: The Ethereal Jellyfish
description: Jellyfish are not fish but rather free-swimming marine animals with a bell-shaped body and trailing tentacles. They can be found in every ocean.

questions.question: What is the collective noun for a group of jellyfish?
Which of the following is true about a jellyfish's body?
options: It has a brain and a heart

questions.question: What is the primary defense of a jellyfish?
options: Using its fins to swim away
Its sting, delivered through its tentacles
questions.correct_answer: Its sting, delivered through its tentacles

questions.question: Which jellyfish species is considered the most venomous animal in the world?
What is a unique characteristic of a jellyfish's life cycle?
options: They can reverse their aging process
They live their entire lives at the bottom of the ocean
They can survive outside of water for short periods
questions.correct_answer: They can reverse their aging process
